mapper.insert: insert into dcdg_settle_settleorder_base (SETTLE_ID, ORDER_ID, GOODS_NUM, SHOP_ID, SHOP_NAME, ADD_TIME, END_TIME, DEDUCTION_POINT, CONSUME_POINT, RMT_AMT, SETTLE_STATUS, IS_PROMOTION) values (#{settleId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{orderId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{goodsNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shopId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{shopName,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{addTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{endTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{deductionPoint,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{consumePoint,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{rmtAmt,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{settleStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{isPromotion,jdbcType=TINYINT})

mapper.select: select SETTLE_ID, ORDER_ID, GOODS_NUM, SHOP_ID, SHOP_NAME, ADD_TIME, END_TIME, DEDUCTION_POINT, CONSUME_POINT, RMT_AMT, SETTLE_STATUS, IS_PROMOTION from dcdg_settle_settleorder_base where SETTLE_ID = #{settleId,jdbcType=CHAR}
